RA0001.fullQuestion: Do you have a physical, mental or learning disability or health condition that means you need support during your case?
RA0001.blurb: We know some people need support to access information and use our services. We often call this a reasonable adjustment. Some reasonable adjustments need to be agreed by the judge or HMCTS. You can discuss with the court if your needs change.
RA0001.hint: Select all that apply to you - specific requirements can be given next
RA0001.command: Select all that apply to you - specific requirements can be given next

error.empty: Select whether you need support

RA0002.blurb: Think about all communications with the court, as well as what you might need at a hearing. Consider remote and in-person hearings, in case your preferred hearing type is not possible.
RA0002.hint: For example, braille or different colours and text sizes

error.empty: Select whether you need documents in an alternate format
